name: Super Bad Platformer

update 1.4 whats new? I have recently added respawning, main music (sound effects coming soon) volume slider and bug fixes such as spikes moving.

update 1.6 whats new? a bug fix, and I finally added more levels!

and just so you people know, its better to play in full screen!
